title: Psychological Testing
description: Fundamentals of psychological test construction (reliability and validity) and applications of intelligence, personality, and interest assessment.  Topics will include theoretical, practical, ethical, and legal issues.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PSYC 1101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BIOS 4401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BMED 2400 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or (MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3225 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
